greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: R(n,k)=2^(n-1) mod semiprime(k).
program: (PARI) trg(nn) = {semip = select(n->bigomega(n) == 2, vector(nn, i, i)); for (n = 1, #semip, for (k = 1, n, print1(2^(n-1) % semip[k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2013
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Dec 02 2010
